fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Outsider: You will appear to not win with Order. 
- Rivalry: The King is not Outsider aligned if you spawn. If you are in the same room with the King, you will deal them 1 HP of Unblockable damage at the end of the phase. You may choose to not have this activated.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Track: Follow the King to the Room they visit this Night phase. Hidden Key may be used. [2 uses]
- Hidden Key: Go to the Kingâ€™s Quarters. [1 use, Unlocks D2] 
- Backup: Draw 2 extra cards immediately. [2 uses, 2 CD] 
- Prepared: Upgrade a card. [1 use, Unique, Unlocks D2]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to Kill the King before Day 5. You will then become the King, assuming the opposite role of the previous King with all abilities. You will still win regardless of your new alignment.
